name: Elfxpedition - Your Mission is to CATCH the Christmas elves!
blurb: The augmented reality App allows children to capture Christmas elves in their own home or anywhere they go!

rewards.reward: \u00abThe Supporter's Mission\u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nFor supporting us your name will appear in the credits. The names will appear in order by donation amount (high to low). Thank you very much.

\u00abThe AWESOME Mission\u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nYou think the project is awesome but don't have children or don't need the App. For supporting us your name will appear in the credits. Thank you very much.
\u00abThe Player's Mission\u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nGet the App when it's released (June 2014) as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much.

\u00abThe Early Bird Gets the App Mission\u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nGet the App before everyone (April 2014) + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much.

\u00ab The Art Book Mission \u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nGet an exclusive Art Book (PDF) + The App before everyone + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much.

\u00ab The V.I.P. Mission \u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nGet a V.I.P. \u00abvirtual\u00bb card + The App before everyone + The exclusive Art Book (PDF) + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much.

« The Artist's Mission »
==============================
Get an exclusive print made by Tom Dell'Aringa (5x7), I will personally sign a thank you + 1 sticker (2.5 x 2.5) + The App before everyone + The V.I.P. «virtual» card + The exclusive Art Book (PDF) + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much.
==============================
FREE shipping to Canada & US. International shipping please add $5.

\u00ab The Great Artist's Mission \u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nGet 2 exclusive prints made by Tom Dell'Aringa (5x7), I will personally sign a thank you + 1 V.I.P. PLASTIFIED CARD with your name on it (credit card size) + 2 stickers (2.5 x 2.5) + The App before everyone + The exclusive Art Book (PDF) + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much. ============================== FREE shipping to Canada & US. International shipping please add $5.

\u00ab The Uniform Mission \u00bb ==============================\r\nGet 1 children's t-shirt + the App before everyone + 2 exclusive prints made by Tom Dell'Aringa (5x7), I will personally sign a thank you + 2 stickers (2.5 x 2.5) + 1 V.I.P. plastified card with your name on it (credit card size) + The exclusive Art Book (PDF) + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much. ============================== FREE shipping to Canada & US. International shipping please add $10.

\u00ab The Ultra Uniform Mission \u00bb ============================== Get 2 children's t-shirt + the App before everyone + 2 exclusive prints made by Tom Dell'Aringa (5x7), I will personally sign a thank you + 2 stickers (2.5 x 2.5) + 1 V.I.P. plastified card with your name on it (credit card size) + The exclusive Art Book (PDF) + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much. ============================== FREE shipping to Canada & US. International shipping please add $12.

\u00ab The Personalized Elf Mission \u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nA cartoon of your face or your child's face will randomly appear in the App as an elf to be captured + The App before everyone + 1 children's t-shirt + 2 exclusive prints made by Tom Dell'Aringa (5x7), I will personally sign a thank you + 2 stickers (2.5 x 2.5) + 1 V.I.P. plastified card with your name on it (credit card size) + The exclusive Art Book (PDF) + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much. ============================== FREE shipping to Canada & US. International shipping please add $10.

\u00ab The BETA Mission \u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nBe one of the 4 Beta testers as well as your name in the credits as a tester + The App before everyone + 1 children's t-shirt + 2 exclusive prints made by Tom Dell'Aringa (5x7), I will personally sign a thank you + 2 stickers (2.5 x 2.5) + 1 V.I.P. plastified card with your name on it (credit card size) + The exclusive Art Book (PDF) + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad. Thank you very much. ============================== FREE shipping to Canada, US and International!

\u00ab The All-Star Mission \u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nBe 1 of the 12 All-Star Elves, and propose a name for him or her. A cartoon of your face or your child's face as an All-Star elf to be captured + The exclusive Art Book (Paper Version) + The App before everyone + 1 children's t-shirt + 2 exclusive prints made by Tom Dell'Aringa (5x7), I will personally sign a thank you + 2 stickers (2.5 x 2.5) + 1 V.I.P. plastified card with your name on it (credit card size) + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much. ============================== FREE shipping to Canada, US and International!

\u00ab The TOTAL Mission \u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nBe 1 of the 2 elves on the Loading Page of the App. A cartoon of your face or your child's face will be on one of these 2 special elves + The App before everyone + 1 children's t-shirt + 2 exclusive prints made by Tom Dell'Aringa (5x7), I will personally sign a thank you + 2 stickers (2.5 x 2.5) + 1 V.I.P. plastified card with your name on it (credit card size) + The exclusive Art Book (Paper Version) + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much. ============================== FREE shipping to Canada, US and International!

\u00ab The MEMBER Mission \u00bb\r\n==============================\r\nBecome part of the team! Give me your opinions and ideas. Be part of our family and get involved! I want to sit with you and talk about the App. Lodging & Food are INCLUDED but the TRAVEL is not included + The App before everyone + 1 children's t-shirt + 2 exclusive prints made by Tom Dell'Aringa (5x7), I will personally sign a thank you + 2 stickers (2.5 x 2.5) + 1 V.I.P. plastified card with your name on it (credit card size) + The exclusive Art Book (Paper Version) + A wallpaper for your desktop, iPhone and iPad as well as your name in the credits. Thank you very much. ============================== FREE shipping to Canada, US and International!
